FoodWasteOriginal.definition: Food waste generated by the original meal combo

WrappingWasteOriginal.definition: Wrapping waste generated by the original meal combo

CookingTimeOriginal.definition: Cooking time for the original meal combo in minutes

FoodWasteExperimental.definition: Food waste generated by the experimental meal combo

WrappingWasteExperimental.definition: Wrapping waste generated by the experimental meal combo

CookingTimeExperimental.definition: Cooking time for the experimental meal combo in minutes

MaxFoodWaste.definition: Maximum allowable food waste as regulated by the government

MaxWrappingWaste.definition: Maximum allowable wrapping waste as regulated by the government
